item.title: Dotfiles
item.description: management git –bare repo method as detailed in atlassian tutorial and similar although I have a clever ‘dots’ alias I tried yadm, stow etc but they never really clicked, needed to do it this way to grok it I don't want to put a file in the git repo and then symlink it out. I want the file to be in the right place, and simply track it by adding it to the bare git repo.
